DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will follow up on babies that had prenatal diagnosis at 2nd or 3rd trimester of normal width and asymetry of lateral brain ventricles
DOC.brief_title: Outcome of Babies With Asymetry of Lateral Brain Ventricles
DOC.detailed_description: Women who will attend 2nd or 3rd ultrasound prenatal scans will be included. Women where the fetus would be diagnosed with lateral ventricles that are normal width (<10 m"m) but discrepacy of >3 m"m will be followed up after delivery by head ultrasound and neurologic exam
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant women between 1930 weeks gestational age and asymetry of lateral ventricles Lateral ventricles >10 m"m
